selections.name: Stellar Cipher
selections.reason: Waller/Melham combination with a nicely bred colt. Dam was a Group 3 winner. Jumpout form suggests ability.

selections.name: Basston
selections.reason: Hayes stable debutant by Wootton Bassett. Respect the stable's success with juveniles.

selections.name: Tough Romance
selections.reason: McEvoy runner who showed improvement in a recent Werribee jumpout.

selections.name: Around The Marx
selections.reason: Has race experience which is valuable here. Worked home okay on debut.

danger_horse.name: Basston
danger_horse.reason: Top stable debutant that could easily win if ready.

selections.name: Meet Me Halfway
selections.reason: Most consistent form in the race with a 2nd and 3rd. Sets the standard.

selections.name: Kiss The King
selections.reason: Hayes debutant who won a Pakenham jumpout. Looks ready to fire.

selections.name: Sealand
selections.reason: Won a Cranbourne jumpout. Market watch advised.

selections.name: Glamour Model
selections.reason: Battled on for 3rd on debut. Will be better for the experience.

danger_horse.name: Kiss The King
danger_horse.reason: Jumpout winner from a premier stable.

selections.name: Grand Old Bowler
selections.reason: Found the line very well on debut over this trip, beaten less than a length. The one to beat with improvement.

selections.name: Bimballa
selections.reason: Resuming. Showed ability in first campaign and drawn the rails.

selections.name: Taupin
selections.reason: Stokes debutant. Trialled well at Sandown.

selections.name: Lightwatch
selections.reason: Fought on well on debut. Can improve.

danger_horse.name: Bimballa
danger_horse.reason: Hayes runner with the rail advantage.

selections.name: Otago
selections.reason: Class runner of the field. Drops from BM78/BM70 grade where he was competitive. Drawn perfectly to control or sit just off.

selections.name: Little Cointreau
selections.reason: Consistent galloper who is rarely far away. Drops in class and maps well.

selections.name: The Western Front
selections.reason: Ran well at Flemington last start. Must be respected in this grade.

selections.name: Mometz
selections.reason: Won two back and sound last start. In the mix.

danger_horse.name: Little Cointreau
danger_horse.reason: Consistent and gets a soft run.

selections.name: Voronya
selections.reason: Godolphin debutant who has won two jumpouts at Pakenham. Looks primed.

selections.name: Wetumpka
selections.reason: Resuming. Has placed 2 of 3 starts and showed ability. Jumpout 2nd was good.

selections.name: Light Moves
selections.reason: Price/Kent debutant. Dam has produced a winner. Watch betting.

selections.name: Gentleman Jim
selections.reason: Better effort second-up. Place chance.

danger_horse.name: Wetumpka
danger_horse.reason: Has race experience and good form.

selections.name: Stormbourg
selections.reason: Racing consistently in this grade. Blinkers go on first time which could be the catalyst.

selections.name: Tuscaloosa Gem
selections.reason: Resuming. Won two jumpouts leading in. Races well fresh.

selections.name: Dapper Don
selections.reason: Solid 3rd last start. Should be competitive again.

selections.name: Oceansprint
selections.reason: Had no luck resuming. Can improve sharply.

selections.name: Savannah Chill
selections.reason: Significant class drop from BM78 to BM62. Ran a good race at Ballarat two back. Hard to beat.

selections.name: Storm Leopard
selections.reason: Last start winner at Geelong. Progressive type.

selections.name: Betwitchery
selections.reason: Fitter for the first-up run. Has class.

selections.name: Norwoods
selections.reason: Consistent performer in this grade.

selections.name: Best Of The Best
selections.reason: Resuming. Won a jumpout impressively. Showed talent in debut campaign.

selections.name: Here The Crowd
selections.reason: Maher runner with good form. Placed in harder races.

selections.name: Bohemian Angel
selections.reason: Moody/Coleman runner. Drawn well and should strip fitter.

selections.name: Bossy Star
selections.reason: Consistent type. Won a jumpout leading in.
